resources.string: Please add Google account to your phone
"Connect to the Internet and restart the app."
"Something went wrong while updating, please try again."

1. You receive 5 tokens for each sensor data provided.
 2. You receive 10 tokens for each noise data provided.
 3. Measurement is run in background periodically, allowing you to use your phone without any worries.
 4. Microphone records your surroundings for 5 seconds each time measurement is taking place.

 Down below you can choose measurement period.
 NOTE! Changes will be applied after you start a new measurement.
"You have permanently declined microphone permission. Go to your app settings to grant it."
"Collecting noise and sensors data, tokens received: %1$d"
"There was an error in measurement process."
"Please connect to the Internet for measurement to be successful."
